# Pull Request Template

## Description

Please include a summary of the changes and which issue is fixed. Please also include relevant motivation and context.

**Fixes # (issue number)**

## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Security improvement
- [ ] Dependency update

## Testing

Please describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes.

- [ ] Unit tests pass
- [ ] Integration tests pass
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality

## Checklist

Please check all that apply to this PR:

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have updated the documentation as needed
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published in downstream modules
- [ ] I have checked my code and corrected any misspellings
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have not introduced any new security vulnerabilities

## Screenshots (if applicable)

If your changes affect the UI or behavior in a way that would benefit from screenshots, please include them here.

## Additional Context

Add any other context or information about the pull request here.

## Security Considerations

If your changes involve security-related functionality:

- [ ] I have considered the security implications of these changes
- [ ] I have reviewed the [SECURITY](SECURITY.md) guidelines
- [ ] My changes follow security best practices
- [ ] I have not introduced any new attack vectors

## Performance Impact

If your changes could impact performance:

- [ ] I have considered the performance implications
- [ ] I have run performance benchmarks if applicable
- [ ] The changes do not degrade performance significantly

---

**Note:** This template helps maintain consistency and quality across all contributions. Please ensure all relevant sections are completed before submitting your PR.
